content.question: Anticolonial movements like the Congress Party in India and the Young Turks agreed on which of the following?

choices.label: The need for reform in order to resist European imperialism
The desire to return their societies to an earlier preindustrial age
Their intent to engage in territorial expansion at the expense of their weaker neighbors
Their emphasis on purely linguistic nationalism
The need to persuade all anticolonial movements to cooperate with European socialist parties

content.answer: The need for reform in order to resist European imperialism

skill.text: Skill 5.B: Explain how a historical development or process relates to another historical development or process.
